results.title: Titan Mining Launches Made-in-America Graphite Production as U.S. Moves to Secure Critical Minerals
results.snippet: Titan has successfully produced natural flake graphite concentrate, now transitioning to the production of material for customer and government qualification programs, marking the first step in re-establishing a domestic natural graphite supply chain in the United States for the first time in more than seven decades.
